original_title: People’s Leasing & Finance PLC enters the National Productivity Certification
original_body_lines: PLC Havelock Branch Branch Manager A.H. Krishantha receives the certificate from Chief Manager Priyanka Wimalasena while (from left) Centralised Marketing Unit Head Office Productivity Unit Officer In Charge Sanath Marasinghe, PLC Branches Productivity Unit Officer In Charge Tarini Manaweera, PLC Havelock Branch Deputy Branch Manager Lalith Abeysinghe, (from right) National Productivity Secretariat training officers Tharinda Marasinghe and Sugath Bandara Dissanayake look on

People’s Leasing & Finance PLC (People’s Leasing), together with the National Productivity Secretariat (NPS) conducted 5S certification recently. PLC successfully completed 21 branches under the productivity concept.
The National Productivity Secretariat selected 21 PLC network branches that revealed the highest levels of productivity.

Havelock, Moratuwa, Parkstreet, Kadawatha, Nugegoda, Dehiwala, Homagama, Battaramulla, Wattala, Maharagama, Grandpass, Kiribathgoda, Negombo, Gampaha, Kelaniya, Minuwangoda, Metro, Pettah, Dehiwala Al- Safa, Ja Ela, and Kirindiwela branches of PLC have been recognised under the National Productivity Certification.
For the first time ever in Sri Lanka’s financial sector, PLC has been awarded the largest number of branch locations under National Productivity Certification at the same time.

With the dedication and enthusiasm of the staff of PLC branches, PLC was able to manage corporate resources efficiently and maintain a pleasant and stable corporate environment that PLC highlights while being an example in the financial sector.
